overview: These bad girls are determined to corrupt this facility administrator!  To piss off the house mom, they'll do anything; even each other!  Lexi had her stepdad's cock and now she wants the house admin's dick too!  He want to do the right thing but Lacy's invitation is too tempting to refuse!
tagline: He may run the detention facility, but the girls are actually in charge!
title: Detention Girls 3: Slutty, Busty & Bad
